biotools.summary: The tool is able to import many specific types of Genotyping data files and analyze them.When case-control studies are analyzed, in addition to the columns with genotyping data, extra columns for cases and controls are necessary in order to distinguish the groups.

bioschemas.name: SNPALYZE
